001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.paper;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.effect.Effector;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.TaskContext;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.PaperUtils;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.effect.PaperParticleEffect;
008import org.bukkit.Location;
009import org.bukkit.Particle;
010import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
011import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
012
013import java.util.Locale;
014
015import static net.kyori.adventure.text.Component.*;
016import static com.github.aecsocket.calibre.paper.CalibrePlugin.format2Raw;
017
018public final class PlayerData {
019    public static final String
020        EXPLOSION_INFO_RESULT = "explosion.info.result",
021        EXPLOSION_INFO_IN_RANGE = "explosion.info.in_range",
022        EXPLOSION_INFO_OUT_RANGE = "explosion.info.out_range",
023        EXPLOSION_INFO_PENETRATE = "explosion.info.penetrate",
024        EXPLOSION_INFO_NO_PENETRATE = "explosion.info.no_penetrate",
025        EXPLOSION_INFO_DAMAGE = "explosion.info.damage",
026        EXPLOSION_INFO_NO_DAMAGE = "explosion.info.no_damage";
027    private static final PaperParticleEffect EXPLOSION_INFO_EFFECT = new PaperParticleEffect(
028        Particle.FLAME, 0, Vector3.ZERO, 0, null
029    );
030    private static final double LINE_STEP = 0.5;
031
032    private final CalibrePlugin plugin;
033    private final Player handle;
034    private final Effector effector;
035
036    CalibreCommand.@Nullable ExplosionInfo explosionInfo;
037
038    PlayerData(CalibrePlugin plugin, Player handle) {
039        this.plugin = plugin;
040        this.handle = handle;
041        effector = plugin.effectors().ofPlayer(handle);
042    }
043
044    public CalibrePlugin plugin() { return plugin; }
045    public Player handle() { return handle; }
046
047    public void load() {
048        if (explosionInfo != null) {
049            explosionInfo.explosion().update();
050        }
051    }
052
053    public void tick(TaskContext ctx) {
054        Location location = handle.getLocation();
055        Vector3 position = PaperUtils.toCommons(location);
056        Locale locale = handle.locale();
057
058        if (explosionInfo != null && explosionInfo.location().getWorld().equals(location.getWorld())) {
059            Explosions.Instance explosion = explosionInfo.explosion();
060            Explosions.Instance.DamageComponent damage = explosion.computeDamage(explosionInfo.location(), handle);
061
062            Location from = explosionInfo.location();
063            Location to = damage.to();
064            double distance = from.distance(to);
065            Vector3 step = PaperUtils.toCommons(to).subtract(PaperUtils.toCommons(from)).divide(distance);
066            Vector3 fromPos = PaperUtils.toCommons(from);
067            for (double d = 0; d < distance; d += LINE_STEP) {
068                effector.spawn(EXPLOSION_INFO_EFFECT, fromPos.add(step.multiply(d)));
069            }
070
071            handle.sendActionBar(plugin.i18n().line(locale, EXPLOSION_INFO_RESULT,
072                c -> c.of("distance", () -> c.line(damage.distance() <= explosion.maxDistance() ? EXPLOSION_INFO_IN_RANGE : EXPLOSION_INFO_OUT_RANGE,
073                    d -> d.of("max_distance", () -> text(format2Raw(locale, explosion.maxDistance()))),
074                    d -> d.of("distance", () -> text(format2Raw(locale, damage.distance())))
075                )),
076                c -> c.of("penetration", () -> c.line(explosion.penetration() > damage.hardness() ? EXPLOSION_INFO_PENETRATE : EXPLOSION_INFO_NO_PENETRATE,
077                    d -> d.of("hardness", () -> text(format2Raw(locale, damage.hardness()))),
078                    d -> d.of("penetration", () -> text(format2Raw(locale, explosion.penetration())))
079                )),
080                c -> c.of("damage", () -> c.line(damage.damage() > plugin.explosions().config().minDamage() ? EXPLOSION_INFO_DAMAGE : EXPLOSION_INFO_NO_DAMAGE,
081                    d -> d.of("damage", () -> text(format2Raw(locale, damage.damage())))))));
082        }
083    }
084}
